title: identity proofing
extract: Identity Proofing Defined. • No consistent definition for identity proofing. • Goes by multiple names. Basic definition: The process by which an organization collects and verifies information about a person for the purpose of account opening or issuing credentials to that person.
extract_html: Identity Proofing Defined. • No consistent definition for identity proofing. • Goes by multiple names. Basic definition: The process by which an organization collects and verifies information about a person for the purpose of account opening or issuing credentials to that person.
